Game information:  


The game is set among the locations of the fictional floating in the sky of the world
called Cocoon, whose government, Sanctum, sends down its citizens suspected of links
to the Pulse, big scary world below. Female soldier codenamed Lightning throws authorities
challenge and fight with them to save his sister, chosen by the gods Pulse and became
an enemy of Cocoon. Soon to join her other characters, and all of them are the same
elected to perform some unknown purpose. Heroes confront Sanctum, trying to figure
out its purpose, in the case of the task they will turn into crystals and will gain
eternal life, in case of failure - will be terrible monsters.


RePack Features:  

FINAL FANTASY XIII
